evaluation_summary: I selected Model A because it gave a clearer and more detailed answer while still keeping the JSON clean and correct. Model B was not wrong, but the response was too brief and did not add much value. Both models followed the instruction to output only JSON and did not include any extra or unnecessary text.

annotations.note: Model A followed the instructions exactly. The JSON was well structured and included enough detail without breaking the JSON-only rule.
Model B met the basic requirements, but the response was too short and lacked useful detail compared to Model A.
